radiographic_examinations.findings: Mild bibasilar dependent atelectasis, emphysematous changes in the lung bases, multiple small hypodense foci in the liver (largest measuring 1.3 cm), no focal consolidation or pleural effusion, mildly thickened adrenal glands, segment of thickened sigmoid colon with adjacent stranding and fluid in the left lower quadrant consistent with sigmoid diverticulitis with microperforation, lumbarization of S1 with partial pseudoarthrosis, areas of sclerosis present in various skeletal locations concerning for osseous metastases.
